word_mean: 粒子组合的：由分开的粒子构成的

sentence.Network_en: These particulate creatures are hardly visible to the naked eyes.

sentence.Network_en: Visible particulate matter can be controlled by adequate regulations.
sentence.Network_cn: 对肉眼可见的颗粒物质的污染通过适当管理即可加以控制.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...可以大致分为颗粒空气污染物（ pollutants）和气态空气污染物（ pollutants）两类。颗粒空气污染物又包括细菌（）、微粒（particulate）、花粉（）、烟尘（）、病毒（）等。气态空气污染物包括气味（smell）、甲醛（）、农药（pesticide）、交通和工业废气（traf.
可过滤:原生物(protozoa)、细菌(bacteria)、细微颗粒(particulate)、化学物或毒素(chemicals/toxins)不可过滤：

entry.tran: （尤指燃料燃烧时产生的）颗粒，微粒
entry.def: Particulates are very small particles of a substance, especially those that are produced when fuel is burned.

example.tran: 我们大气中的颗粒物污染

means.word_mean: 1. a small discrete mass of solid or liquid matter that remains individually dispersed in gas or liquid emissions (usually considered to be an atmospheric pollutant)
